auth_sentence.content: But Mr. Gurgel says that even that speed was lower than he had told officials to expect.

auth_sentence.content: "I've designed six tracks and no one has ever flown off it," Udo Gurgel said.

auth_sentence.content: "I think an investigation is important; we would call for an investigation if it were not already planned," Mr. Gurgel said.
